definition: Report of whether the sampling site is located whithin a protected area, values 'yes', 'no' and 'partially'
Date when the sampling event started (YYYY-MM-DD)
Date when the sampling event ended (YYYY-MM-DD)
Remarks about the area of the sampling event
Recorded presence (=1) or absence (=0) of the species
Units reported for the recorded abundance of the species, values 'NOIR': number of individual records, 'RAI': relative abundance index, 'AI/month': abundance index per month
Source of the record, either literature or data paper (DOI: 10.1002/ecy.3128)
Remarks about the duration of the sampling event
